(OOC: Than a cave it is.)
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
=
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, July 29, 2000 1:23 AM
  Subject=
: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  Just a cave or something would be fine, Orchid...
=
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg=
@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 11:40 PM
    Subject: Re: Neo=
 Beast Wars


    (OOC: Alright. fine, Soulstice, just don't go crazy. :-/ =
*Starts thinking* Why don't you decide?.)
      ----- Original Message ----=
- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Friday, J=
uly 28, 2000 8:28 PM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      (Damn, Orchi=
d! Is the Beach the only place you know? I thought they would go find a nic=
e secluded place and work out their differences! Man!)
        ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
        From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups=
.com 
        Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 8:21 PM
        Subject: Re: Neo =
Beast Wars


        *Infectra nods to Stranato*

        Infectra: I agree=
 with that.




        *Blizzard starts walking for the beach while holdin=
g Sinister's hand*




        *Twister sits at a table inside the base and=
 sits her hands on the table and bangs her head on it and sits there*
     =
     ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
          To: n=
bwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 8:02 PM
          =
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          "We must do something, the Maximals=
 we have never betrayed, we must go to them." Stranato said.

          Sin=
ister nodded to Blizard, he held her hand and started to walk to wherever B=
lizzard wanted to go...
            ----- Original Message ----- 
         =
   From: ilovealllizards 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            S=
ent: Friday, July 28, 2000 5:08 PM
            Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
=


            Blizzard: Hmm...If you think you don't need healing than we s=
hall be off.

            *Blizzard says to Sinister*

            *Twister=
 walks into the base*



            Infectra: I don't think we can change =
the way they act...If we do that they'll just go as before....That doesn't =
mean we totally shouldn't try it.....*sigh*

            *Infectra says whi=
le frowning*
              ----- Original Message ----- 
              From=
: THECODE 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Friday=
, July 28, 2000 5:24 AM
              Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


       =
       Sinesis goes to the CR Chamber to get healed.

              "Why wh=
en we can go now?" Sinister asked Blizzard.

              "I guess so, now=
 that our friends are gone I don't know where we should go." Stranato said =
to Infectra.

              "We never betrayed the Maximals, you think they=
's want us back?" Airbomber asked.

              "They ignored our talent =
before, what makes you think it'll be any different this time?" Stranato as=
ked.

              "You can fake amnesia." Airbomber suggested.

         =
     "It's stupid, but it might work." Stranato said...
                ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
                From: ilovealllizards 
         =
       To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 =
4:58 AM
                Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                *Infe=
ctra looks around and sighs while looking at the ground and the sky and the=
 bushs*

                Infectra: I wonder how'll we'll start...and what w=
e'll eat......

                *Infectra sighs and frowns*



            =
    Blizzard: Yeah!

                *Blizzard says quickly and evilly*

  =
              Blizzard: That's perfect. But first you should get into prime=
 condition. A small trip to the CR Chamber wouldn't hurt, would it?

      =
          *Blizzard says in a nice jolly tone to Sinister*


              =
  Twister: I'll see if I see you...

                *Twister says to Sines=
is as she gets closer to the Base*

                *Twister looks back at =
Sinesis and just stares. Than she looks at Blizzard and Sinister and frowns=
 baring her teeth and turning away*
                  ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
                  From: THECODE 
                  To: nbwrpg@egro=
ups.com 
                  Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 2:05 AM
            =
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                  Stranto sighed. He ho=
ped they weren't running along, skipping merrily to their dooms.

         =
         "I hope not, dear." Airbomber said to Infectra.

                 =
 Sinister smiled wickidly to Blizzard.

                  "Like a quiet spo=
t nobody knows about?" He asked. Sinesis groaned. He worried about his brot=
her's virginity for a while...
                    ----- Original Message -=
---- 
                    From: ilovealllizards 
                    To: nb=
wrpg@egroups.com 
                    Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 12:18 AM
=
                    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                    *Bliz=
zard breaks the kiss* (OOC:If it wasn't already broken)

                  =
  Blizzard: Want to go somewhere after you get healed up?

                =
    *Blizzard asks Sinister*


                    *Twister looks at Blizza=
rd and Sinister and frowns with a big sigh. She than stands up walks closer=
 to the Base with her head lowered*


                    *Infectra sighs*
=

                    Infectra: I hope that the wind isn't a tornado.

     =
               *Infectra closes her optics*

                    Infectra: =
Now where are heading? Which way?

                    *Infectra asks Airbo=
mber while pointing her extended finger around*
